_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
dn29:4.1+dn29:40.7^who_else_mentioned: Cunda, Buddha, Saṅgha, Uddaka, Rāma, Sakyan, the Blessed One, Gotama, Māras, Brahmās, The Realized One
before^dn29:41.6^who_mentioned: Nigaṇṭha Nātaputta, Jain ascetics, white-clothed lay disciples
before^dn29:41.6^where: the land of the Sakyans in a stilt longhouse in a mango grove belonging to the Sakyan family named Vedhañña
where: the land of the Sakyans in a stilt longhouse in a mango grove belonging to the Sakyan family named Vedhañña
